suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Marketplace, Scheduled Blocking, Edge Firewall, serverless integration, secure serverless functions, time-controlled access, edge functions, access control, application security
suggest.meta_description: Explore Azion Marketplace's Scheduled Blocking for secure serverless access control. Instant setup and comprehensive security solutions on Edge Firewall.

current.meta_description: Scheduled Blocking allows you to control the access to your application based on a time schedule, according to your needs.
